text:
Cole Mitchell Sprouse (born August 4, 1992) is an American actor. He is the twin brother of Dylan Sprouse.
He is known for his role as Cody Martin on the Disney Channel series "The Suite Life of Zack & Cody" and its spinoff "The Suite Life on Deck". In 2017, Sprouse began starring as Jughead Jones on The CW television series "Riverdale".

annotations.surface_form: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody
